import React, {Component, useState} from 'react'; import {Navbar, Nav, Container, Modal, Form, Button, FormControl } from "react-bootstrap"; import {Switch, BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Logo from '../Images/logo.png'; import Main from '../Pages/Main.js'; import AboutUs from '../Pages/AboutUs.js'; import Productions from '../Pages/Productions.js'; import Pass from '../Pages/Pass.js'; import ForClient from '../Pages/ForClient.js'; import Contacts from '../Pages/Contacts.js'; import Forma from './Form.js'; export default function Header (){ function updateData (value) { this.setState({ height: value }) }; const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const openModal = () => setShow(true); const closeModal = () => setShow(false); return( <>
